channel.title: Blogs on Luca Berton's Website, Blog and all the Cool Stuff. Web is my playground!
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Luca Berton's Website, Blog and all the Cool Stuff. Web is my playground!

item.title: WebFundamentals contributions
item.description: In theese few months I’ve started my contribution to Google WebFundamentals project as contributor and Italian translator. More about my pull requests. See me soon on the contributors page.

item.title: New start
item.description: My previous web page design was too outdated so I want to start with newest technology. Welcome to my brand new website powered by Hugo!
